SKT_FIRST.name: Dead Man's Party
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to reduce the targets' <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击2名敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Fool's Paradise
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Buffs</color> from the target and inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burn</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nIf the target is Earth Element, this attack does not miss and decreases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与える。\n<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1つ</color>解除し、<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を付与する。\n対象が地属性の場合、ミスが発生せず<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격합니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>의 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제하고 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color> 상태로 만듭니다.\n대상이 지속성이라면 빗나감이 발생하지 않으며 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击2名敌人。\n有<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>的概率解除目标的<color=#28d9ed>1个</color><color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>,并造成<color=#28d9ed>烧伤</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n若目标为地属性,则不会发生闪避,并使<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Changes to Single Attack\nGreatly increases damage\nIncreased Effectiveness for 2 turns before using skill
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 単体攻撃に変更\nダメージ大幅UP\n効果命中+2ターン
SKT_BURST_1.effect_kr: 단일 공격으로 변경\n피해량 대폭 증가\n스킬 사용 전 효과 적중 +2턴
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 变更为单体攻击\n伤害量大幅提升\n施展技能前,效果命中提升+2回合

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nRemoves Buffs ▶ Steals Buff
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n強化効果を解除 ▶ 強化効果を奪う
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n강화 해제 ▶ 강화 효과 강탈
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n强化解除 ▶ 夺取强化效果

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: No One Lives Forever
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to decrease <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> of all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nAdditionally, has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nIf the target is Earth Element, this attack does not miss.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間、敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>と<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>をDOWNさせる。\nさらに<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間<color=#28d9ed>回復不可</color>を付与する。\n対象が地属性の場合、ミスが発生しない。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>를 감소시킵니다.\n추가로 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>회복 불가</color>를 부여합니다.\n대상이 지속성이라면 빗나감이 발생하지 않습니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击2名敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>的概率使全体敌人的<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>和<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n此外,有<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>的概率对全体敌人施加<color=#28d9ed>无法恢复</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n若目标为地属性,则不会发生闪避。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>弱点攻略</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>약점 공략</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能同行效果</color>:攻击后,使全体友军获得<color=#28d9ed>攻击破绽</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使目标的防御力降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
